channel.title: Starting A RSPS
channel.description: Is it posibil to code on 317 castle wars and clan wars? If so,please give me a server from moparscape to do it and start it thanks!

item.title: Starting A RSPS
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

If you’re a fan of 508’s just follow a tutorial on adding 508 maps, they should contain clanwars and deffo castle wars. The code behind it should be fairly easy.

Read full topic

item.title: Starting A RSPS
item.dc:creator: @Java-RSPS-Noob Java-RSPS-Noob
item.description:
@Java-RSPS-Noob wrote:

of course it is…most PI’s have a partial castle wars base already

clan wars? shouldn’t be too hard safepk = funpk pretty much and dangerouspk = similar methods to wilderness just without level differences?

clan wars maps? use google…

clan wars minigame itself? it’s like pest control… add a timer for how long the game goes for, add teams/have it to say on an interface how many players are on each side. Make it so each team fights each other (safe/danger)

it isn’t THAT difficult. it just takes some trial/error

Read full topic

item.title: Starting A RSPS

item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

Of course it’s possible. I’ve seen multiple Castle Wars tutorials. More so than Clan Wars.

Read full topic
